059b13cd-a1ba-4ef5-a685-3326ae3d2d8f: Using a {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g} on a Frontline area grants allies in the area +{uip|DodgeBonus|1d4ab291faad4ed4aa3fa918a43ec0d6}% increased {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against other allies' attacks.
0c3d44f8-a342-4683-a7c0-b46cc99aefaf: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} chooses one of the Combat Tactics areas. For 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, all allies within the {g|Encyclopedia:Range}range{/g} of {uip|Range|7005fbf810a64264893cd18fc0187b39} cells gain the {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} to move to that area. This movement does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} and does not spend {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.
13529d9d-5673-4891-8413-39694ebe2bef:
Enemies suffer −<u>(5 + 2 × ({g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}))</u> {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, −25% {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g}, and −<u>(5 + (Grand Strategist's INT + FEL bonus))</u> {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} during attacks.
Additionally, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} enemies have their {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} reduced by −3, and {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} enemies try to get into {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}. An enemy counts as a melee enemy if they have at least one melee weapon.
! This additional effect does not work on some stronger enemies.
161afc2e-3632-48f5-bb06-94aafe0be6c0: All allies in the selected area also gain +20% to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}.
19627d88-dd71-4f94-a236-be71e7994dfd: At the start of combat, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} gains one random unknown {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g} and can use it until the end of combat for 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
1bd81e40-44d8-4dcd-ad8c-dc6122cc5d1e: Allies, including the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g}, in the same Combat Tactics area with the Grand Strategist gain +{uip|StatBonus|0baaa1db7cf44a52ac7cf9beee62f230} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}.
1f6c02f4-bce0-4196-9cb5-72099273901b: Using a {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g} on a Combat Tactics area grants the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} the {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} to use all {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} abilities on allies in the area regardless of distance.
1faf76a7-00c3-4717-b7c9-f7484ece4d14: All Combat Tactics {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} are increased by +{uip|BonusBonus|c44292911a6d404b928176a5371eaaae}% if the area was not moved for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.
214c99c2-96e2-4c31-8eb3-b1b51afcacfe: Using a {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g} on a Combat Tactics area grants all allies in the area the {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} to move 1 cell without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.
25e9ebfb-1b46-4ec6-9824-a62dde020567: The first {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g} used in a {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} can be used a second time for 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
29fa1f97-18b4-44af-872c-74b6d10d58fe: All allies in the selected areas have their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} increased by +20.
2bb18646-ca59-49ec-b4ef-3fae23adc3fa:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} marks an area of 5×2 cells on the battlefield — the backline. All allies in the backline area gain +{uip|CoverDodgeBonus|bc99e6ba256f45368bc6bc529e59effd}% {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, and +{uip|DodgePenetrationBonus|bc99e6ba256f45368bc6bc529e59effd}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}.
The backline can be moved by using this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} again.
38902ad9-0e85-40cf-a336-5e33df80644b: Each time the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} uses a {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g}, they gain a stack of the strategic perfection effect. At 6 stacks of strategic perfection, the next stratagem applies the benefits of all stratagems known by the Grand Strategist, then all the stacks are removed.
41bcbdc7-e4d7-4396-be80-aaa6f874a6d9: Each ally in the Rear area gains +{uip|BonusCritChance|ec81fa9d154544bcb9f5bc3c1a8feb91}% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} if there are no enemies in a 5-cell radius around the ally.
4610b1e1-9566-4fbe-93d3-a99e97bb5926: All allies in the Rear area are healed by medikits for +{uip|TemporaryWounds|43087167f03b46ff9c28c9914aa47e54} more and gain the same amount of {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}. Medikits used by allies in the Rear area cost −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less.
4c202309-6c31-4e52-ab02-6e3dff6543f4: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} chooses one of the Combat Tactics areas. For 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, all attacks by allies in that area gain covering against any enemy that fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. Covering: Enemies suffer −{uip|BallisticSkillPenalty|7a5637714948456686eeaafa37f51813} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, −25% {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g}, and −{uip|WeaponSkillPenalty|7a5637714948456686eeaafa37f51813} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} during attacks against these allies. Additionally, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} enemies have their {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} reduced by −3, and {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} enemies will try to get behind {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}. An enemy counts as a melee enemy if they have at least one melee weapon. ! This additional effect does not work on some stronger enemies.
5a42f8a7-973e-4964-8e71-3fa60c815f0a: Allies under the effects of Trenchline Stratagem will {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} without movement and are immune to all types of forced movement.
5a607afb-c716-4e07-9195-70c7793a893e: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} chooses one of the Combat Tactics areas. For 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, all enemies in that area are forced to re-roll successful {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} against all attacks. Any enemies that suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and are left with less than {uip|MinimumWounds|ab86bcee2036424c90dd12c2ad3fab39} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, immediately die.
5aa704c6-23f0-4d78-868f-fe70ecc8165d:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} marks an area of 5×2 cells on the battlefield — the rear. All allies in the rear area deal +{uip|DamageBonus|b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5}% {g|Encyclopedia:Range}range{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, gain +{uip|CritChanceBonus|b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5}% {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}overpenetration{/g} and +{uip|CritChanceIncrease|b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5}% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g}.
The rear can be moved by using this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} again.
5ad182e2-9e18-45da-b400-3a7d0735217b: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} chooses one of the Combat Tactics areas. For 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the targeted area's {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} are doubled. All other tactical areas are discharged and cannot be used this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, but can be designated again next round.
611ea718-1136-4774-93c7-0bd09f68d230: Every time allies under the effect of Stronghold Stratagem should have suffered an {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g}, they gain +{uip|TemporaryWounds|bb601b2b4d404a219b33426afcf1d783} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} instead.
62b80a48-78ea-4116-8b1c-8c45b8534730: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} chooses one of the Combat Tactics areas. For 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, allies in that area gain +{uip|BonusArmour|111f6e8111ae4d30a9d5d6d06027281d}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, cannot be overpenetrated, gain immunity to the {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} effect, and gain +{uip|BonusDeflection|111f6e8111ae4d30a9d5d6d06027281d} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}. Additionally, they do not suffer {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g} for receiving {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
68342300-8917-4b5f-8689-326fb7068326: All attacks by the allies located in the selected area ignore 20% of the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}.
70342965-9433-4019-bd4f-eb2d0c7ec1ee: After the use of Combat Locus Stratagem, one of the areas removed by Combat Locus Stratagem can be recreated immediately.
725a1083-d2d0-4ccc-93a8-919881afdc00: The maximum number of the {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} granted by Take and Hold is increased to 5.
73652c02-a15b-4589-baa2-7b50f55106e7: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} chooses one of the Combat Tactics areas. For 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, all allies in that area gain +{uip|CoverBonus|0e89f6eda1ae4960aeebfed0737289a3}% {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} and re-roll all failed {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g}. Additionally, cover in the area does not suffer any {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
7b42298e-3de5-4ce4-8fd9-11482cc34f9d:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} marks an area of 4×4 cells on the battlefield — the frontline. All allies in the frontline gain a +{uip|ArmourBonus|7cdf3a1dd3b5477096e008492e738587}% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, and all enemies suffer +{uip|DamageBonus|7cdf3a1dd3b5477096e008492e738587}% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from any source.
The frontline can be moved by using this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} again.
7bf09a9e-832c-43a5-8008-afc46f2149cb: Using a {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g} on a Combat Tactics area grants all allies in the area +{unit_stat|WarhammerIntelligence|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} against the next {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} they suffer.
7d2d6844-1c42-4a1e-b009-ab6a9c008039: Every time a Combat Tactics area is affected by a {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g}, all allies in that area gain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} for the following {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Stacks with itself.
817e9105-0af4-478a-bede-4557b26ac23a:
Masters of battlefield positioning for themselves and their allies, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} is able to increase the battle effectiveness of their party by designating and strengthening important parts of the battlefield.
Core focus: battlefield control, ally buffs, unique utility, enemy debuffs.
8dfaf1dd-e5fc-4eea-b1c6-6d5dfd0462bc:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} chooses one combat tactics area. Every ally inside that area gains an additional {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} with 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} at the start of the Grand Strategist's next turn.
For every enemy that was killed in the selected combat tactics area, this AP is increased by +1 (up to maximum 3) and MP by +2 (up to maximum 6).
The Grand Strategist's MP are reduced to 1 until the end of combat.
8ff3f00b-0ad4-4319-b5e4-6f03572d85b5: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} analyses the battlefield and can create specific areas providing {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} to all allies including the Grand Strategist: Frontline, Backline, and Rear. In the first {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, all 3 areas can be created. In the following turn, only one of them can be created. All areas can be moved with the corresponding {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and cannot overlap. If there are two or more Grand Strategists in the party, the Combat Tactics areas are common for all the Grand Strategists, and the highest {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} bonus and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} bonus of all the Grand Strategists is used. There cannot be more than one Frontline, Backline, or Rear on the battlefield. Regardless of the abilities used, the Grand Strategist always acts first in combat.
907c9e5a-cb45-4247-a0a4-aa96cc0a6164: Enemies in the same Combat Tactics area with the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} suffer a −{uip|DodgeParryPenalty|2821d25b055348b5977aa16143bbd73e}% {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}.
99f28961-b780-43fd-8166-7859eb5587d3: Using a {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g} on a Combat Tactics area for the second time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} refunds 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. This effect can be activated once per turn.
9d18b557-fb33-42c3-8599-65a75cc9fcbb: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} forced by Overwhelming Stratagem are made with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|2758369cb14a43cdb72df3e7d1aad9cb} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.
a0c44774-f225-4a46-9ca0-377e5e965a69: If there are no enemies in the Backline area, the first attack in the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} made by every ally in that area costs −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less.
a3b94195-01c6-4d07-83a9-e18f34362c3c: Using a {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g} on a Backline area grants allies in the area +{uip|CritChanceBonus|e76b4151d3554a369e3801ba27a6a9b6}% increased {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} against enemies they are protected by {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} from.
a56cf2a8-c729-4a5d-a6b1-f6ff625390a1: If there are more enemies than allies in the Frontline area, all allies in the area gain +{uip|BonusParryDodge|4264c8ae4ca646fa97f42b5183ac5fd7}% to {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}. If there are more allies than enemies in the Frontline area, all allies in the area deal +{uip|BonusDamage|4264c8ae4ca646fa97f42b5183ac5fd7}% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
a72097a8-4b5a-4308-9a9d-b6b74b6a8d16: Using a {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g} on a Rear area also makes the allies in that area the enemies' lowest {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority targets{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
adcee0fb-4a40-457c-aadb-5faa44706021: Every enemy killed in the Frontline area increases all {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} of Combat Tactics areas by +1 until the end of combat.
c3d74487-ce84-42fc-bc1c-9ebee6177d4a:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} chooses one combat tactics area. Every ally inside that area gains an additional {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} with 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} at the start of the Grand Strategist's next turn.
For every enemy that was killed in the selected combat tactics area, the additional AP is increased by +1 (up to maximum 3), and the additional MP is increased by +2 (up to maximum 6).
d08c8e4d-33fd-499b-9155-c00a4cf38846: Allies gain the {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} to reposition the Combat Tactics area they are currently in at the cost of 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
e18ebe2e-bcd4-40df-b020-9a77c720d83b: Re-rolls forced by Killzone Stratagem are made with a −15 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.
